General.Name: Spend
General.Description: The MoxyOne project aims to create a seamless and secure debit card and payment infrastructure for every company, project and ICO that issues cryptocurrency tokens. MoxyOne provides a debit card, wallet system and virtual debit card, allowing users to make purchases within company ecosystems and “real-world” merchants worldwide. Spend is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. It is the fuel for the MoxyOne system.

ICO.Description:
The MoxyOne project aims to create a seamless and secure debit card and payment infrastructure for every company, project and ICO that issues cryptocurrency tokens. MoxyOne provides a debit card, wallet system and virtual debit card, allowing users to make purchases within company ecosystems and “real-world” merchants worldwide. Spend is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. It is the fuel for the MoxyOne system.

Team:

  • Mo Abbas: Co-Founder & Lead Developer 
  • Tanshul Kumar: Co-Founder & Lead Front End Developer 
  • Bennett Gale: Web Developer 
  • Shivangni Singh: Marketing & Research 

The MoxyOne ICO Public Pre Sale will start on the 8th of February and will end on the 10th of March, the Public Sale will start on the 14th of March and Ends on the 14th of April. The ICO token allocation represents 70% of the total toke supply and will be available for a 0.001 ETH starting price. The ICO funding target is set at 4000 ETH.

Token Reserve Split (30%):

  • MoxyOne - 10%
  • Marketing & Partnerships - 20%

The MoxyOne ICO features a bonus and referral campaign.

Pre sale Bonus Structure:

  • 1 ETH 40% / ETH, vesting period 30 days
  • 30 ETH 45% / ETH, vesting period 45 days
  • 100 ETH 50% / ETH, vesting period 60 days
  • 500 ETH 55% / ETH, vesting period 90 days
  • 2500 ETH 65% / ETH, vesting period 150 days.

Public Sale Bonus Structure:

  • First 24h: 40%
  • Week 1: 12.5%
  • Week 2: 11.5%
  • Week 3: 10%
